headline: James Morton, 89, Dean Who Invigorated a Creaky Cathedral, Dies
abstract: Leading the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine for 25 years, he sought to make it central to urban life.
lead_paragraph: The Very Rev. James Parks Morton, who in 25 years as dean of the Cathedral Church of St. John the Divine in Upper Manhattan transformed it from a religious backwater into a vibrant center for the arts, the homeless, circus performers, household pets, endangered animals and interfaith engagement, died on Saturday at his home in Manhattan. He was 89.
keywords: Cathedral Church of St John the Divine (Manhattan, NY)
